issue.title: [Go] Implement ApproxEquals for Scalar values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13980](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13980). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Scalar types for Arrow Go currently only implement `Equals` and there is a TODO left for implementing the `ApproxEquals` similar to how it's done for `ArrayApproxEquals`.
